Text: texaco trades Cc a correction for Texaco trades All Financial trades will be under Texaco Inc All physical trades will be under Texaco Natural Gas Inc Sorry for the confusion Patrick X

FW Sequent Energy Management Assignment Cc All of the EOL deals are included in this assignment This assignment agreement template we have is EOL specific If you could forward us a template for nonEOL we will take care of that deal separately or you can adjust this agreement to account for all deals Original Message From Hunter Larry Joe Sent Monday August PM To Mulvany Patrick Cc Anderson Diane Subject FW Sequent Energy Management Assignment Importance High Patrick Can you take care of this Thanks Joe Original Message From Heard Marie Sent Monday August PM To Hunter Larry Joe Cc Espinoza Veronica Subject FW Sequent Energy Management Assignment Importance High Hi Joe Tana said I should forward this email to you and that you guys would prepare the assignment and send to us for review Let me know if this is not the case Please note that all of the deals with the exception of the first one are EOL deals Thanks for your help Marie Original Message From Espinoza Veronica Sent Monday August AM To Bailey Susan Boyd Samantha Heard Marie Panus Stephanie Cc Jones Tana Subject Sequent Energy Management Assignment Importance High Legal Team Per the recent change in Company structure for Sequent Energy Management LLC there are a number of financial deals that must be assigned over to the correct entitySequent Energy Management LP Please prepare trade assignment documentation for the following deals please note that all of these deals except for the first one were executed on EOL VT VM VM VM VM VM VN VN VN VN VP VP VQ VR VR VU VU Also ENA does not have an ISDA in place with the counterpartyall deals were confirmed under GTCs Please give me a call if you need any other info Thanks again Veronica Espinoza x

RE SequentMarie The trade date is August It was sent out on the second of August Patrick Original Message From Heard Marie Sent Wednesday August PM To Mulvany Patrick Subject Sequent Hi Patrick Can you provide me with the date for Deal No VT Thanks Marie

Riskmantra vs EGM Cc Tana There are about deals in pending sent to legal status that are Riskmantra vs EGM My question is should we even be doing trades with Enron Gas Marketing And if we should can we set up an ISDA with RMT with an effective date of Thanks Patrick

FW Riskmantra vs EGM Cc Tana I was just following about these trades Original Message From Mulvany Patrick Sent Wednesday October PM To Jones Tana Cc Anderson Diane Subject Riskmantra vs EGM Tana There are about deals in pending sent to legal status that are Riskmantra vs EGM My question is should we even be doing trades with Enron Gas Marketing And if we should can we set up an ISDA with RMT with an effective date of Thanks Patrick

RE Riskmantra vs EGM Cc Tana These deals are purely for storage They used tagg to capture the value of storing the physical gas Pat Ryder in Risk Management put these deals in and has told me they are used for value and should be Not to be Confirmed If you see no issue I will simply change their status to Not to be Confirmed If their status of being under EGM is still a problem Pat said you could call him at Thanks Patrick Original Message From Jones Tana Sent Friday October PM To Bradford William S Mulvany Patrick Brackett Debbie R Cc Anderson Diane Moran Tom Subject RE Riskmantra vs EGM Patrick Can we track down whohow these trades are getting entered into the system Is there someone entering the trades into the system Is this just an old counterpartybook set up in GCP that needs to get renamed Legal me has no idea why trades are being done out of EGM Can we find out who is doing them Original Message From Bradford William S Sent Friday October PM To Mulvany Patrick Jones Tana Brackett Debbie R Cc Anderson Diane Moran Tom Subject RE Riskmantra vs EGM I think this refers to gas daily trades between Risk Management and Trade which is an Enron entity set up for state tax reasons and EGM which may be a company code for Enron North America Corp formerly known as Enron Gas Marketing Inc If this is the case we should document them under the Master between ENA and RMT However this is up to Legal Bill Original Message From Mulvany Patrick Sent Friday October PM To Jones Tana Brackett Debbie R Bradford William S Cc Anderson Diane Subject FW Riskmantra vs EGM Here is a list of all the trades with EGM Thanks Patrick Financial Confirmations File exportcsv Original Message From Jones Tana Sent Friday October PM To Mulvany Patrick Anderson Diane Subject FW Riskmantra vs EGM I also got an email back from Bill Bradford head of Credit that siad this doesnt make sense Maybe you need to prepare a print out of the trades and send to debbie me bill Original Message From Brackett Debbie R Sent Friday October AM To Jones Tana Subject RE Riskmantra vs EGM No idea EGM doesnt exist Original Message From Jones Tana Sent Thursday October PM To Brackett Debbie R Bradford William S Campbell Lesli Conwell Wendy Espinoza Veronica Johnson Rudwell Lebrocq Wendi Mendoza Nidia Moran Tom Ngo Tracy Radous Paul Rohauer Tanya Sacks Edward Vanek Darren Williams Jason R Credit Cc Mulvany Patrick Subject FW Riskmantra vs EGM Does anyone in Credit know the answer to this question as I dont Original Message From Mulvany Patrick Sent Thursday October PM To Jones Tana Cc Anderson Diane Subject FW Riskmantra vs EGM Tana I was just following about these trades Original Message From Mulvany Patrick Sent Wednesday October PM To Jones Tana Cc Anderson Diane Subject Riskmantra vs EGM Tana There are about deals in pending sent to legal status that are Riskmantra vs EGM My question is should we even be doing trades with Enron Gas Marketing And if we should can we set up an ISDA with RMT with an effective date of Thanks Patrick

broker changes Cc Amerex is no longer under the short name of AMERX in deal capture From this point on the short name is AMERG which stands for Amerex Natural Gas Ltd AMERX will now default to Amerex Petroleum which is incorrect Also the broker Spectron is no longer SPECT The new short name is SPECI which stands for Spectron Energy Inc If you have any questions please let me know Thanks Patrick Mulvany
broker namesis an updated list of all brokers and which one of us handles the specific broker Patrick Kristine

new texaco short name Cc now all trades done with Texaco will now be listed with the short name of TEXACOINC instead of TEXACOGASMKT Also the broker TCT Natural Gas has become of part of Tradespark LP If you have any questions please let me know Thanks Patrick

FW Deutsche BankBTMessage From Ornelas Bianca Sent Tuesday March PM To Mulvany Patrick Subject Deutsche BankBT Forwarded by Bianca OrnelasNAEnron on PM From Bianca Ornelas AM To Anne nron Carole NRON Jason NRON Denver nron Jody NRON Patrick nron Kyle R CT Jeff NRON Victor CT Bruce NRON Andres NRON Souad NRON Sherry nron Laura NRON Amy NRON Luchas nron Liz nron Susan M CT Kimat CT Ryan O nronXgate Ellen NRON Jean CT Patrick nronXgate Bianca nron cc Larry Joe CT Jeffrey C CT Errol NRON Kam CT Phillip M CT Darron C CT David CT cc Subject Deutsche BankBT Per this email The counterparty Deutsche Bank is no longer BT Its short name is now DEUTSCHEBANAKT Please feel free to call me if you have any questions Thanks for your time Patrick Forwarded by Bianca OrnelasNAEnron on AM Enron North America Corp From Larry Joe Hunter ECT PM To Bianca nron cc Subject Aquila EOL Forwarded by Larry Joe HunterHOUECT on PM From Russell Diamond PM To Carol St CT Tana CT Susan CT Tanya CT Lisa CT Stephanie CT Walter nron Tom CT Anthony CT Larry Joe CT cc Subject Aquila EOL GOOD NEWS It is a go Per Susan Bailey we have received executed docs from Aquila and plan to have the assignment effective tomorrow In addition EOL is all set up so all financial trading should occur out of Aquila Risk Management beginning tomorrow Thanks for everyones help Russell Forwarded by Russell DiamondHOUECT on PM From Russell Diamond PM To Carol St CT Tana CT Susan CT Tanya CT Lisa CT Stephanie CT Walter nron Tom CT Anthony CT cc Subject Aquila EOL Good NewsBad News Good News First Aquila with much help from our EOL group has set up all of their users to begin trading tomorrow Bad News At this time we have not received the executed assignment from Aquila I just spoke to Angela their contracts person who told me their VP has yet to sign the assignment Until we get the docs in Utilicorp will continue to be the counterparty I will keep you all updated Russell Forwarded by Russell DiamondHOUECT on PM From Russell Diamond AM To Mark CT John CT Tana CT Susan CT Carol St CT Lisa CT Stephanie CT Karen O nron Walter nron Tanya CT Anthony CT Tom CT cc Veronica NRON Edward nron Tracy CT Wendi nron Rudwell NRON Darren nron Jason R NRON Paul NRON Wendy NRON Veronica CT Brant CT Subject Aquila EOL To All As most of you all know by now Utilicorp is assigning their ISDA to Aquila Risk with a proposed effective date of tomorrow Friday Feb My concern with this is if the ISDA is executed with an effective date of Feb then we are not going to be able to trade financially out of Utilicorp including EOL They are having trouble setting uptransferring their EOL users although I have been assured by my Credit contact and the Contract Person at Aquila that the assignment is still going to be executed with this effective date If this is the case then tomorrow Utilicorp will be shut down on EOL and if they have not set Aquila Risk up correctly they will not be able to trade on EOL at all financially I have notified my contacts of this scenario and they are comfortable with this I will keep you all updated as I hear more throughout the day Russell

financially I have notified my contacts of this scenario and they are comfortable with this I will keep you all updated as I hear more throughout the day Russell

RE EOL dealThats itthanks Your on vacation stop checking your emailenjoy Incubus Patrick Original Message From McLaughlin Jr Errol Sent Tuesday November AM To Mulvany Patrick Subject RE EOL deal If this is the trade w Virginia Power I am at home on vacation talk w Chris Chang in settlements She called me last week and said they were disputing the volume and we agreed to change the trade If is not w Va Power call me at Original Message From Mulvany Patrick Sent Tue AM To McLaughlin Jr Errol Cc Subject EOL deal Errol There is an EOL trade that you changed the volume from day to day In EOL the trade data reads day Is there a reason for that change Thanks Patrick

new deals Cc Sara Here is a list of new deals since December There are several deals listed as pending bankruptcy but were put there by our group due to the bankruptcy itself These deals do not have any generated confirmations but can be done very quickly if you would like Please let me know what you would like me to do Thanks Patrick X
